title: Patch Notes
content: . Fixed an incorrect condition length on the Blood of Lathander's Sunbeam tooltip. Fixed incorrect descriptions of the end conditions for Invisibility in the tooltips for the Potion of Invisibility, Invisibility spell, and Scroll of Invisibility. Corrected the tooltip for the owlbear in Honour Mode, which now indicates that she can call for help every combat, not every round. Clarified that the Lifedrinker passive only works for attacks made with your Pact Weapon. Fixed the display title of Baal
